com.microsoft.bingads.internal

Class OAuthWithAuthorizationCode

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.microsoft.bingads.Authentication
      • com.microsoft.bingads.internal.OAuthWithAuthorizationCode
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    OAuthDesktopMobileAuthCodeGrant, OAuthWebAuthCodeGrant

    public abstract class OAuthWithAuthorizationCode
extends Authentication
    Implements the OAuth Authorization Code Grant Flow "https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/bingads/guides/authentication-oauth?view=bingads-12"

      protected OAuthTokens oAuthTokens

        public URL getAuthorizationEndpoint()
        Returns OAuth Authorization Endpoint that the user has to navigate to from the browser in order to get to the user consent page.
        Returns:
        OAuth Authorization Endpoint

      • requestAccessAndRefreshTokens

        public OAuthTokens requestAccessAndRefreshTokens(URL responseUrl)
        Retrieves OAuth tokens from authorization server using the authorization code provided by user.
        Parameters:
        responseUrl - Authorization response redirect Uri containing the authorization code. See: {"http://tools.ietf.org/html/draft-ietf-oauth-v2-15#section-4.1.2"}
        Returns:
        OAuth tokens

      • requestAccessAndRefreshTokens

        public OAuthTokens requestAccessAndRefreshTokens(String refreshToken)
        Retrieves OAuth tokens from authorization server using the refresh token provided by user.
        Parameters:
        refreshToken - Refresh token. See "http://tools.ietf.org/html/draft-ietf-oauth-v2-15#section-6".
        Returns:
        OAuth tokens

      • refreshTokensIfNeeded

        public OAuthTokens refreshTokensIfNeeded(boolean forceRefresh)
        Retrieves OAuth tokens from authorization server using the last known refresh token from the current session.
        When the current access token expires, it needs to be refreshed. It can be refreshed using the refresh token that was receive before (either provided directly by user or retrieved using the authorization code). The ServiceClient detects access token expiration and calls this method to refresh it.
        Parameters:
        forceRefresh -
        Returns:
        OAuth tokens
